title: Chocolate Croissant French Toast Casserole
directions: Add half the torn croissants and scatter half the chopped chocolate on top. Repeat the layers by topping with the remaining croissants and chocolate.

Beat the eggs in a large bowl then add the milk, sugar, vanilla and salt and whisk until combined. Pour the batter over the top of the croissants and press down with your hands to make sure all the pieces of bread are soaking in the mixture. Cover tightly and refrigerate for at least two hours or up to overnight.

Remove casserole from refrigerator to remove the chill. Heat oven to 350 degrees F. Bake, covered with foil, for 30 minutes then remove the foil and continue baking for 15 to 20 minutes more, until puffed and golden.
ingredients: One 4-ounce bar semi sweet chocolate, chopped
